entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY THIS EVENING, THEN THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE DAMAGING WINDS AND LARGE HAIL THIS EVENING
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 15 TO 20 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
